bug.author: yuvaldrori
bug.description:
Hello. Using the instructions in <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/deploy-cli/>"Instructions for using the CLI to deploy Kubeflow on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)"</denchmark-link> I was able to create a Kubeflow 0.5.0 cluster: <denchmark-code>kfctl init ${KFAPP} --platform gcp --project ${PROJECT} --use_basic_auth -V cd ${KFAPP} kfctl generate all -V --zone ${ZONE} kfctl apply all -V </denchmark-code>
Trying to destroy and recreate will not work. After destroying the load balancer and backends will not be cleaned up. <denchmark-code>kfctl kfctl delete all --delete_storage kfctl apply all -V </denchmark-code>
Thanks.
